info.title: Availability API
info.description:
API for retrieving business and directory availability time slots.

## Access Requirements

These endpoints are **only available for Directory Tokens**. Staff tokens and other token types will receive a 403 Forbidden error.

## Rate Limiting

The directory availability endpoint uses a distributed lock to prevent concurrent requests for the same directory. If another request is currently processing, you will receive a 429 Too Many Requests error. Wait a few seconds and retry.

## Pagination

- Page numbers are **0-based** (first page is `page=0`)
- Maximum page size is **10 items** (requests for larger sizes will be capped)
- Default page size is **10 items**

Bearer.description: Provide a valid bearer token in the Authorization header. Example: 'Authorization: Bearer {app_token}'

get.description:
Retrieve availability time slots for a specific business within a date range

 **Only available for Directory Tokens**

400.description:
Bad Request - Invalid parameters. Common causes:
- Missing required `start_date` or `end_date`
- Invalid date format (must be YYYY-MM-DD)
- Start date is after end date

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token

403.description: Forbidden - Only Directory tokens can access this endpoint

422.description: Validation Error - Business logic validation failed (e.g., invalid staff availability data)

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unexpected error occurred

get.description:
Retrieve availability time slots for multiple businesses in a directory. Returns paginated results with available booking slots for each business.

**Only available for Directory Tokens**

**Rate Limiting:** Uses a distributed lock per directory. Concurrent requests for the same directory will receive a 429 error.

**Timeout:** 10 seconds maximum response time

parameters.name: date_end
parameters.description: End date in YYYY-MM-DD format. **Maximum 7 days** from start date.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination. **0-based** (first page is 0).

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of items per page. **Maximum and default is 10.**

parameters.name: scheduling_enabled
parameters.description: Filter businesses by online scheduling status. When `true` (default), only returns businesses with online scheduling enabled. When `false`, returns businesses with scheduling disabled.

400.description:
Invalid request parameters. Common causes:
- Missing required `date_start` or `date_end`
- Invalid date format (must be YYYY-MM-DD)
- Date range exceeds 7 days

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid or missing bearer token

403.description: Forbidden - only Directory tokens can access this endpoint. Staff tokens and other token types are not permitted.

422.description: Validation Error - Business logic validation failed (e.g., invalid staff availability data)

429.description: Too Many Requests - another request is currently processing for this directory. Wait a few seconds and retry.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unexpected error occurred

504.description: Gateway Timeout - Request exceeded 10 second timeout. Try reducing the date range or number of businesses.
